channel.title: Client loading problem
channel.description:
I've been experiencing some difficulties with my client, there's something wrong with it when the loading screen is about to show. I've tried restarting the client, closing all Java applications manually through the task manager and running it again but still nothing. This is what it shows.
[img]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/1420/38b9a72d0d9f4b49b03febc.png[/img]
I would highly appreciate it if someone would explain how to fix this, thank you.

item.title: Client loading problem
